standard.description: Tests that are specific to the Millenium Gen2 project

test.test_name: Button Static IDs should be correctly named
test.query_clob:
select case when lower(aapb.button_static_id) like 'btn%'
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapb.workspace,
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button static id `%3` (app %1, page %2) should be prefixed with `btn`', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.button_static_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button static id `%3` should be prefixed with `btn` (app %1, page %2, name `%0`, button id %4)', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.button_static_id,
				p4 => aapb.button_id) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_name,
       aapb.button_template_options,
       aapb.button_is_hot,
       aapb.label,
       aapb.database_action,
       aapb.button_static_id
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_applications aa on aapb.application_id = aa.application_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapb.button_static_id is not null
test.explanation: Button static ids should be prefixed with \`btn\`
